TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AdRotator extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl

summary.span: 在网页上显示广告横幅。

span.span: Displays an advertisement banner on a Web page.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#Introduction) - [XML 播发文件格式XML Advertisement File Format](#XMLAdvertisementFileFormat) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#DeclarativeSyntax) ## 介绍Introduction 使用控件在网页上显示随机选择的广告横幅。Use the control to display a randomly selected advertisement banner on the Web page. 每当刷新该页面更改显示的广告。The displayed advertisement changes whenever the page refreshes. 播发信息存储在单独的 XML 文件中。Advertisement information is stored in a separate XML file. XML 文件，可维护的播发和其关联的属性的列表。The XML file allows you to maintain a list of advertisements and their associated attributes. 属性包含该图像显示时单击该控件，以显示图像不可用时的替换文字、 关键字和播发的频率要链接到的 URL 的路径。Attributes include the path to an image to display, the URL to link to when the control is clicked, the alternate text to display when the image is not available, a keyword, and the frequency of the advertisement. 此文件中的信息不通过验证控件。Information in this file is not validated by the control. 若要阻止执行恶意脚本广告，您应始终释放它前, 检查数据或接受仅来自受信任源的 ad 信息。To prevent ads from executing malicious scripts, you should always check the data before releasing it, or accept ad information only from trusted sources. 若要保护你从未经授权的 Internet 访问的播发文件，请执行一个或多个以下操作：To secure your advertisement file from unauthorized Internet access, do one or more of the following: - 将其存储在 App_Data 目录中，配置为拒绝 Internet 访问的任何类型的文件。Store it in the App_Data directory, which is configured to deny Internet access for files of any type. - 重命名不是.xml 扩展名的文件，并将映射到扩展`HttpForbiddenHandler`在 Web.config 中。有关详细信息，请参阅 Machine.config 文件中的部分。Rename the file with an extension that is not .xml, and map the extension to the `HttpForbiddenHandler` in Web.config. For more information, see the section in your Machine.config file. 作为 XML 文件作为数据源的替代方法，则可以提供播发信息通过回调事件。As an alternative to an XML file as the source of data, it is possible to provide advertisement information through a callback event. 此事件还可结合用 XML 文件来扩展的行为的控制权，例如重定向到另一个页。This event can also be used in combination with the XML file to extend the behavior of the control, such as redirecting to another page. 请参阅有关其他信息的文件格式的属性。See the property for additional information on the file format. > [!NOTE] > 启用页面缓存后，控件不会缓存。When page caching is enabled, an control is not cached. 每当刷新 Web 页面，新的播发处于选中状态。A new advertisement is selected whenever the Web page refreshes. 新的播发处于未选中状态，但是，你提供的事件处理程序事件。A new advertisement is not selected, however, if you provide an event handler for the event. ## XML 播发文件格式XML Advertisement File Format 控件使用单独的 XML 播发文件来存储播发信息，例如显示图像的位置和要链接到的页的 URL。The control uses a separate XML advertisement file to store the advertisement information, such as the location of the image to display and the URL of the page to link to. 属性控件指定此文件的路径。The property of the control specifies the path to this file. 创建播发文件时，开始标记与结束``标记分别标记开头和结尾的文件。When creating the advertisement file, opening and closing `` tags mark the beginning and the end of the file, respectively. 打开和关闭``标记分隔每个播发。Opening and closing `` tags delimit each advertisement. 所有播发都嵌套到开始和结束之间``标记。All advertisements are nested between the opening and closing `` tags. 如果该文件包含多个``标记，仅第一组``文件中的标记将通过分析控件。If the file contains multiple `` tags, only the first set of `` tags in the file will be parsed by the control. 所有其他``标记将被忽略。All other `` tags will be ignored. 对于每个播发的数据元素嵌套到开始和结束之间``标记。The data elements for each advertisement are nested between the opening and closing `` tags. 尽管预定义的某些数据元素 (如和)，你可以将自定义元素之间的放置``标记。Although certain data elements are predefined (such as and ), you can place custom elements between the `` tags. 这些元素将由读取控件在分析该文件。These elements will be read by the control when it parses the file. 然后将信息传递给中的事件字典属性。The information is then passed to the event in the dictionary property. 下表列出 XML 播发文件预定义的数据元素。The following table lists the data elements that are predefined for the XML advertisement file. |元素Element|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| |`ImageUrl`|（可选） 图像文件的绝对或相对 URL。The absolute or relative URL to an image file (optional).| |`NavigateUrl`|如果用户单击 ad （可选） 链接到页面的 URL。The URL of a page to link to if the user clicks the ad (optional). **注意：** 如果未设置此元素，`HRef`上定位点标记属性不会呈现。**Note:** If this element is not set, the `HRef` property is not rendered on the anchor tag.| |`Height`|图像，以像素为单位 （可选） 的高度。The height of the image, in pixels (optional).| |`Width`|图像，以像素为单位 （可选） 的宽度。The width of the image, in pixels (optional).| |`AlternateText`|文本显示在指定的图像的图像代替属性不可用 （可选）。The text display in place of the image when the image specified by the property is not available (optional).

在某些浏览器，此文本也显示为`ToolTip`播发。In some browsers, this text also appears as a `ToolTip` for the advertisement.| |`Keyword`|你可以筛选 （可选） 通过播发 （例如，"计算机"） 的类别。A category for the advertisement (for example, "computers") that you can filter by (optional).| |`Impressions`|一个数字，指示在相对于其他广告 （可选） 文件中的旋转计划中的 ad 的重要性。A number that indicates the importance of the ad in the schedule of rotation relative to the other ads in the file (optional).

较大的数字，频率显示广告。The larger the number, the more often the ad is displayed. 所有的总和``XML 文件中的值不能超过 2047999999 *。*The total of all `` values in the XML file cannot exceed 2,047,999,999 *.* 如果是这样，控件将引发运行时异常。If it does, the control throws a run-time exception.| 下面的示例演示 XML 播发文件的格式。The following example shows the format for the XML advertisement file. ``` URL of image to display for Advertisement #1 URL of page to link to for Advertisement #1 Text to show as a ToolTip for Advertisement #1 Keyword used to filter for Advertisement #1 Relative importance of Advertisement #1 Custom Data about Advertisement #1 ``` ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用控件在网页上显示广告横幅。The following code example demonstrates how to use the control to display an advertisement banner on a Web page. [!code-aspx-csharp[classic adrotator.advertisementfile example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic AdRotator.AdvertisementFile Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[classic adrotator.advertisementfile example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic AdRotator.AdvertisementFile Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示一个包含前一示例的播发信息的 XML 文件的文件格式。The following code example demonstrates the file format for an XML file that contains advertisement information for the previous example. 文件格式的详细信息，请参阅成员。For more information on the file format, see the member. ``` ~/Images/image1.jpg 60 190 http://www.microsoft.com Microsoft Main Site 80 Topic1 ~/Images/image2.jpg 90 90 http://www.wingtiptoys.com Wingtip Toys 80 Topic2 ```

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数来创建和初始化的新实例类。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建和初始化的新实例类。The following code example demonstrates how to create and initialize a new instance of the class. 新然后将控件添加到集合控制并在 Web 窗体页上显示。The new control is then added to the collection of a control and displayed on the Web Forms page. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，并可能无法正常工作如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[AdRotatorCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/AdRotatorCtor/CS/adrotatorctorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[AdRotatorCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/AdRotatorCtor/VB/adrotatorctorvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event AdCreated As AdCreatedEventHandler

summary.span: 在控件创建后、呈现页面前，在每个到服务器的往返行程过程中发生一次。

span.span: Occurs once per round trip to the server after the creation of the control, but before the page is rendered.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呈现每个往返后创建的控件，但页之前服务器后，将引发此事件。This event is raised once per round trip to the server after the creation of the control, but before the page is rendered. 当设置属性，则会发生此事件后已从文件中选择播发。When the property is set, this event occurs after the advertisement has been selected from the file. 你可以控制如何控件显示通过修改传递给事件处理程序的参数事件。You can control how the control is displayed by modifying the arguments passed to the event handler of the event. 如果未设置属性，这允许您播发信息直接指定，而无需使用单独的播发文件。If the property is not set, this allows you to specify the advertisement information directly, without using a separate advertisement file. 如果属性设置，这样您就可以扩展的行为的控制权，例如重定向到另一个页。If the property is set, this allows you to extend the behavior of the control, such as redirecting to another page. > [!NOTE] > 启用页面缓存后，控件不会缓存。When page caching is enabled, an control is not cached. 每当刷新 Web 页面，新的播发处于选中状态。A new advertisement is selected whenever the Web page refreshes. 新的播发处于未选中状态，但是，你提供的事件处理程序事件。A new advertisement is not selected, however, if you provide an event handler for the event. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何指定和代码的处理程序事件。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event. 它获取与播发关联的 URL 时控件创建，并将其显示在控件的下方。It gets the URL associated with the advertisement, when the control is created, and displays it below the control. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，并可能无法正常工作如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic AdCreatedEventArgs Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic AdCreatedEventArgs Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic AdCreatedEventArgs Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic AdCreatedEventArgs Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何设置包含播发信息的 XML 文件的格式。The following code example demonstrates how to format the XML file that contains the advertisement information. XML 文件的详细信息，请参阅属性。For more information on the XML file, see the property. ``` ~/Images/image1.jpg 60 190 http://www.microsoft.com Microsoft Main Site 80 Topic1 This is the caption for Ad#1 ~/Images/image2.jpg 90 90 http://www.wingtiptoys.com Wingtip Toys 80 Topic2 This is the caption for Ad#2 ``` > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，并可能无法正常工作如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[AdCreatedEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/AdCreatedEventHandler/CS/adcreatedeventhandlercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[AdCreatedEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/AdCreatedEventHandler/VB/adcreatedeventhandlervb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ AdvertisementFile { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置包含公布信息的 XML 文件的路径。

span.span: Gets or sets the path to an XML file that contains advertisement information.

value.span: 包含公布信息的 XML 文件的位置。

span.span: The location of an XML file containing advertisement information.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定一个包含播发信息的 XML 文件的位置。Use the property to specify the location of an XML file that contains advertisement information. XML 文件必须驻留在同一个网站。The XML file must reside within the same Web site. 有关部署和安全方面的考虑，强烈建议你将文件放在同一个 Web 应用程序。For deployment and security purposes, it is strongly recommended that you place the file in the same Web application. 仅可以访问位于同一站点上的不同应用程序，如果应用程序具有足够的信任关系的 XML 文件。It is only possible to access an XML file that is located in a different application on the same site if the application has sufficient trust. 可以将此属性设置为绝对路径或相对于 XML 文件的路径。You can set this property to either an absolute path or a path relative to the XML file. 使用相对路径来简化部署。Use a relative path to simplify deployment. 如果使用相对路径，该路径是相对路径包含的页或用户控件的位置控件。If you use a relative path, that path is relative to the location of the page or user control that contains the control. 属性是可选的。The property is optional. 播发也可以以编程方式设置事件。An advertisement can also be programmatically set in the event. XML 文件包含以下预定义的属性。The XML file contains the following predefined attributes. 仅`ImageUrl`属性是必选项。Only the `ImageUrl` attribute is required. |特性Attribute|描述Description| |---------------|-----------------| |`ImageUrl`|要显示的图像的 URL。The URL of the image to display.| |`Height`|图像，以像素为单位 （可选） 的高度。The height of the image, in pixels (optional).| |`Width`|图像，以像素为单位 （可选） 的宽度。The width of the image, in pixels (optional).| |`NavigateUrl`|页面的 URL 导航到时控件被单击。The URL of the page to navigate to when the control is clicked.| |`AlternateText`|要显示如果图像是不可用的文本。The text to display if the image is unavailable. 在某些浏览器，此文本显示为工具提示。On some browsers, this text is displayed as a ToolTip.| |`Keyword`|播发的类别。The category for the advertisement. 使用此控件，以筛选特定类别的播发的列表。This is used by the control to filter the list of advertisements for a specific category.| |`Impressions`|一个值，指示相对于其他 XML 文件中的播发显示播发的频率。A value that indicates how often an advertisement is displayed in relation to other advertisements in the XML file.| > [!NOTE] > `ImageUrl`和`NavigateUrl`属性可以是完整的 URL，相对于根目录的路径或相对路径。The `ImageUrl` and `NavigateUrl` attributes can be a full URL, a root-relative path, or a relative path. 如果使用相对于根目录的路径，该路径是相对于同一网站。If you use a root-relative path, the path is relative to the same Web site. 如果使用相对路径，该路径是相对包含播发文件的目录。If you use a relative path, the path is relative to the directory that contains the advertisement file. 此外可以通过使用自定义标记 XML 文件中包含自定义属性。You can also include custom attributes by using custom tags in the XML file. 从播发文件分析的所有属性标记和值都将置于字典。All attribute tags are parsed from the advertisement file, and the values are placed in the dictionary. 你可以使用字典以编程方式访问你的自定义特性。You can use the dictionary to programmatically access your custom attributes. 此文件中的信息不通过验证控件。Information in this file is not validated by the control. 若要阻止执行恶意脚本广告，您应始终释放它前, 检查数据或接受仅来自受信任源的 ad 信息。To prevent ads from executing malicious scripts, you should always check the data before releasing it, or accept ad information only from trusted sources. 若要保护你从未经授权的 Internet 访问的播发文件，请执行一个或多个以下操作：To secure your advertisement file from unauthorized Internet access, do one or more of the following: - 将其存储在数据目录中，在 Machine.config，拒绝 Internet 访问的任何类型的文件中配置。Store it in the Data directory, which is configured in Machine.config to deny Internet access for files of any type. - 重命名不是.xml 扩展名的文件，并将映射到扩展`HttpForbiddenHandler`在 Web.config 中。有关详细信息，请参阅 Machine.config 文件中的部分。Rename the file with an extension that is not .xml, and map the extension to `HttpForbiddenHandler` in Web.config. For more information, see the section in your Machine.config file. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性，以指定包含播发信息的 XML 文件的位置。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the location of the XML file that contains advertisement information. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic AdRotator.AdvertisementFile Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic AdRotator.AdvertisementFile Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic AdRotator.AdvertisementFile Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic AdRotator.AdvertisementFile Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例显示 XML 播发文件的文件格式。The following code example shows the file format of the XML advertisement file. ``` ~/Images/image1.jpg 60 190 http://www.microsoft.com Microsoft Main Site 80 Topic1 This is the caption for Ad#1 ~/Images/image2.jpg 90 90 http://www.wingtiptoys.com Wingtip Toys 80 Topic2 This is the caption for Ad#2 ```

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ AlternateTextField { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个自定义数据字段，使用它代替广告的 特性。

span.span: Gets or sets a custom data field to use in place of the attribute for an advertisement.

value.span: 用于标识存储有广告替换文字的字段的名称。

span.span: The name that identifies the field where the alternate text for an advertisement is stored.
The default value is "AlternateText."

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性用于选择要使用替代自定义数据字段`AlternateText`播发的属性。The property is used to select a custom data field to use in place of the `AlternateText` attribute for an advertisement. 如`AlternateText`，在包含播发信息的 XML 文件中定义此自定义字段。Like `AlternateText`, this custom field is defined in the XML file that contains advertisement information. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性以指定自定义数据字段。The following code example demonstrates using the property to specify a custom data field. ， ，和属性用于动态选择自定义字段来代替使用`NavigateUrl`， `ImageUrl`，和`AlternateText`属性。The , , and properties are used to dynamically select a custom field to use in place of the `NavigateUrl`, `ImageUrl`, and `AlternateText` attributes. 此示例使用设备筛选器以指示自定义字段应该用于启用无线应用程序协议 WAP 了设备。This example uses a device filter to indicate that custom fields should be used for Wireless Application Protocol (WAP)-enabled devices. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator.MobileExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator.MobileExamples/CS/defaultcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator.MobileExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator.MobileExamples/VB/defaultvb.aspx#1)] 下面是前面的示例的示例 XML 数据。The following is the sample XML data for the previous example. ``` ~/Images/ad1.gif http://msdn.microsoft.com/vbasic/ Visual Basic Developer Site 140 100 ~/Images/mobileAd1.jpg http://msdn.microsoft.com/mobile/ Windows Mobile Developer Site ~/Images/ad2.gif http://msdn.microsoft.com MSDN 150 150 ~/Images/mobileAd2.jpg http://msdn.microsoft.com/mobility/ Windows Mobile Developer Site ```

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property Font As FontInfo
public: virtual property System::Web::UI::WebControls::FontInfo ^ Font { System::Web::UI::WebControls::FontInfo ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取与广告横幅控件关联的字体属性。

span.span: Gets the font properties associated with the advertisement banner control.

value.span: 一个 对象，它表示该控件的字体属性。

span.span: A object that represents the font properties of the control.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ImageUrlField { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个自定义数据字段，使用它代替广告的 特性。

span.span: Gets or sets a custom data field to use in place of the attribute for an advertisement.

value.span: 用于标识存储有为广告所显示图像的 URL 的字段的名称。

span.span: The name that identifies the field where the URL for the image displayed for an advertisement is stored.
The default value is "ImageUrl."

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性用于选择自定义数据字段用于代替`ImageUrl`播发的属性。The property is used for selecting a custom data field used in place of the `ImageUrl` attribute for an advertisement. 如`ImageUrl`，在包含播发信息的 XML 文件中定义此自定义字段。Like `ImageUrl`, this custom field is defined in the XML file that contains advertisement information. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性以指定自定义数据字段。The following code example demonstrates using the property to specify a custom data field. ， ，和属性用于动态选择自定义字段来代替使用`NavigateUrl`， `ImageUrl`，和`AlternateText`属性。The , , and properties are used to dynamically select a custom field to use in place of the `NavigateUrl`, `ImageUrl`, and `AlternateText` attributes. 此示例使用设备筛选器以指示自定义字段应该用于启用无线应用程序协议 WAP 了设备。This example uses a device filter to indicate that custom fields should be used for Wireless Application Protocol (WAP)-enabled devices. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator.MobileExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator.MobileExamples/CS/defaultcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator.MobileExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator.MobileExamples/VB/defaultvb.aspx#1)] 下面是前面的示例的示例 XML 数据。The following is the sample XML data for the previous example. ``` ~/Images/ad1.gif http://msdn.microsoft.com/vbasic/ Visual Basic Developer Site 140 100 ~/Images/mobileAd1.jpg http://msdn.microsoft.com/mobile/ Windows Mobile Developer Site ~/Images/ad2.gif http://msdn.microsoft.com MSDN 150 150 ~/Images/mobileAd2.jpg http://msdn.microsoft.com/mobility/ Windows Mobile Developer Site ```

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ KeywordFilter { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置类别关键字以筛选出 XML 公布文件中特定类型的公布。

span.span: Gets or sets a category keyword to filter for specific types of advertisements in the XML advertisement file.

value.span: 用于筛选出 XML 公布文件中特定类型的公布的关键字。

span.span: The keyword to filter for specific types of advertisements in the XML advertisement file.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks XML 播发文件中的每个播发可以分配类别关键字。Each advertisement in the XML advertisement file can be assigned a category keyword. 使用属性筛选指定关键字的播发。Use the property to filter the advertisements for the specified keyword. 仅该字符串包含关键字的播发将会选择控件。Only advertisements containing the keyword will be selected for the control. 可以以编程方式设置属性以匹配的用户配置文件。The property can be programmatically set to match the profile of the user. 属性是非常简单筛选器，搜索为指定的关键字。The property is a very simple filter that searches for the specified keyword. 不能指定中的多个关键字属性，也不是可以声明播发文件中的多个关键字。It is not possible to specify more than one keyword in the property, nor is it possible to declare multiple keywords in the advertisement file. > [!NOTE] > 属性需要设置此属性产生任何影响。The property needs to be set for this property to have any effect. > [!CAUTION] > 如果在 XML 播发文件中找不到指定的关键字，如所示无播发控件。If the specified keyword is not found in the XML advertisement file, no advertisement is displayed in the control. 请务必与播发文件中的至少一个匹配项中指定此属性的关键字。Be sure to specify a keyword for this property with at least one match in the advertisement file. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性筛选为游戏相关的播发。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to filter for game-related advertisements. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic AdRotator.KeywordFilter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic AdRotator.KeywordFilter Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic AdRotator.KeywordFilter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic AdRotator.KeywordFilter Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何在 XML 播发文件中指定对于每个播发的关键字。The following code example demonstrates how to specify a keyword for each advertisement in the XML advertisement file. 文件格式的详细信息，请参阅成员。For more information on the file format, see the member. ``` ~/Images/image1.jpg 60 190 http://www.microsoft.com Microsoft Main Site 80 Business This is the caption for Ad#1 ~/Images/image2.jpg 90 90 http://www.wingtiptoys.com Wingtip Toys 80 Games This is the caption for Ad#2 ```

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ NavigateUrlField { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个自定义数据字段，使用它代替广告的 特性。

span.span: Gets or sets a custom data field to use in place of the attribute for an advertisement.

value.span: 用于标识以下字段的名称：该字段包含在单击 控件时要导航至的页的 URL。

span.span: The name that identifies the field containing the URL for the page to navigate to when the control is clicked.
The default value is "NavigateUrl."

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性用于选择代替使用的自定义数据字段`NavigateUrl`播发的属性。The property is used to select a custom data field used in place of the `NavigateUrl` attribute for an advertisement. 如`NavigateUrl`，在包含播发信息的 XML 文件中定义此自定义字段。Like `NavigateUrl`, this custom field is defined in the XML file that contains advertisement information. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性以指定自定义数据字段。The following code example demonstrates using the property to specify a custom data field. ， ，和属性用于动态选择自定义字段来代替使用`NavigateUrl`， `ImageUrl`，和`AlternateText`属性。The , , and properties are used to dynamically select a custom field to use in place of the `NavigateUrl`, `ImageUrl`, and `AlternateText` attributes. 此示例使用设备筛选器以指示自定义字段应该用于启用无线应用程序协议 WAP 了设备。This example uses a device filter to indicate that custom fields should be used for Wireless Application Protocol (WAP)-enabled devices. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator.MobileExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator.MobileExamples/CS/defaultcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator.MobileExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator.MobileExamples/VB/defaultvb.aspx#1)] 下面是前面的示例的示例 XML 数据。The following is the sample XML data for the previous example. ``` ~/Images/ad1.gif http://msdn.microsoft.com/vbasic/ Visual Basic Developer Site 140 100 ~/Images/mobileAd1.jpg http://msdn.microsoft.com/mobile/ Windows Mobile Developer Site ~/Images/ad2.gif http://msdn.microsoft.com MSDN 150 150 ~/Images/mobileAd2.jpg http://msdn.microsoft.com/mobility/ Windows Mobile Developer Site ```

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnAdCreated(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdCreatedEventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub OnAdCreated (e As AdCreatedEventArgs)

span.span: An that contains event data.

summary.span: 为 控件引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event for the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 后在服务器上引发事件创建控件，但在呈现页面之前。The event is raised on the server after the control is created, but before the page is rendered. 如果设置属性，通过选择播发后，将引发事件控件。If the property is set, the event is raised after an advertisement has been selected by the control. 引发事件时，将调用通过委托事件处理方法。Raising an event invokes the event-handling method through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 在 Web 窗体应用程序中使用事件](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md)。For more information, see [How to: Consume Events in a Web Forms Application](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何指定和代码的处理程序事件。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event. 它将获取与播发相关联的 URL 时控件创建，并将其显示在控件的下方。It gets the URL associated with the advertisement when the control is created and displays it below the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic AdCreatedEventArgs Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic AdCreatedEventArgs Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic AdCreatedEventArgs Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic AdCreatedEventArgs Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何设置包含播发信息的 XML 文件的格式。The following code example demonstrates how to format the XML file that contains the advertisement information. XML 文件的详细信息，请参阅属性。For more information on the XML file, see the property. ``` ~/Images/image1.jpg 60 190 http://www.microsoft.com Microsoft Main Site 80 Topic1 This is the caption for Ad#1 ~/Images/image2.jpg 90 90 http://www.wingtiptoys.com Wingtip Toys 80 Topic2 This is the caption for Ad#2 ``` [!code-aspx-csharp[AdCreatedEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/AdCreatedEventHandler/CS/adcreatedeventhandlercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[AdCreatedEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/AdCreatedEventHandler/VB/adcreatedeventhandlervb.aspx#1)]

para.span: 在重写在派生类中，一定要调用基类的方法。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method.

span.span: Binds the specified data source to the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法主要由控件开发人员使用。This method is used primarily by control developers. 方法调用由基类类方法将播发数据从数据源绑定到控件。The method is called by the base class methods to bind the advertisement data from a data source to the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 显示图像中所选广告从获取。Displays an image obtained from the advertisement chosen in . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写自定义服务器控件中的方法，以便显示随机的播发，从 XML 文件，包含链接和图像。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control so that the displays a random advertisement, from an XML file, with a link and an image. [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomADRotatorRender0#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomADRotatorRender0/CS/customadrotatorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomADRotatorRender0#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomADRotatorRender0/VB/customadrotatorvb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomADRotatorRender0#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomADRotatorRender0/CS/customadrotator.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomADRotatorRender0#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomADRotatorRender0/VB/customadrotator.vb#2)]

protected: virtual property System::Web::UI::HtmlTextWriterTag TagKey { System::Web::UI::HtmlTextWriterTag get(); };

summary.span: 获取 控件的 HTML 标记。

span.span: Gets the HTML tag for the control.

value.span: 一个 枚举值，表示 控件的 HTML 标记。

span.span: An enumeration value representing the HTML tag for an control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性主要由控件开发人员使用。This property is used primarily by control developers. 使用属性来确定与关联的值控件。Use the property to determine the value associated with an control. 此属性重写基实现来始终返回。This property overrides the base implementation to always return .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Target { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置当单击 控件时，显示所链接到的网页的内容的浏览器窗口或框架的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the browser window or frame that displays the contents of the Web page linked to when the control is clicked.

value.span: 当单击 控件时，显示所链接到的网页的内容的浏览器窗口或框架。

span.span: The browser window or frame that displays the contents of the Web page linked to when the control is clicked.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，该值刷新具有焦点的窗口或框架。

span.span: The default value is an empty string (""), which refreshes the window or frame with focus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定的目标窗口或框架，它显示的网页内容时所链接到控件被单击。Use the property to specify the target window or frame that displays the contents of the Web page linked to when the control is clicked. > [!NOTE] > 属性呈现为`target`属性。The property renders as a `target` attribute . `target`上定位点的属性 (`a`) XHTML 1.1 中不允许的元素。The `target` attribute on anchor (`a`) elements is not allowed in XHTML 1.1. 因此，如果呈现的标记必须符合 XHTML 标准，或者必须符合辅助功能标准，则不要设置属性。Therefore, if rendered markup must conform to XHTML standards or must conform to accessibility standards, do not set the property. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在 Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 的 XHTML 标准](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1b78d416-66bb-43a5-ac77-c703aab55b97)和[Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 中的辅助功能](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)。For more information, see [XHTML Standards in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1b78d416-66bb-43a5-ac77-c703aab55b97) and [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13). 值必须以字母 a 到 Z （区分大小写），除了下列特殊值，其中以下划线开头范围的开头。The value must begin with a letter in the range of A to Z (case-insensitive), except for the following special values, which begin with an underscore. |目标值Target value|描述Description| |------------------|-----------------| |`_blank`|将内容呈现在一个没有框架的新窗口中。Renders the content in a new window without frames.| |`_parent`|将内容呈现在上一个框架集父级中。Renders the content in the immediate frameset parent.| |`_search`|在搜索窗格中呈现内容。Renders the content in the search pane.| |`_self`|将内容呈现在含焦点的框架中。Renders the content in the frame with focus.| |`_top`|将内容呈现在没有框架的全窗口中。Renders the content in the full window without frames.| > [!NOTE] > 请查看浏览器文档，确定是否支持 `_search` 值。Check your browser documentation to determine whether the `_search` value is supported. 例如，Internet Explorer 5.0 或更高版本支持`_search`目标值。For example, Internet Explorer 5.0 or later supports the `_search` target value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. 它显示的内容时所链接到网页在新的未划分框架窗口中单击控件时。It displays the contents of the Web page linked to when the control is clicked in a new, unframed window. [!code-aspx-csharp[classic adrotator.advertisementfile example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic AdRotator.AdvertisementFile Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[classic adrotator.advertisementfile example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic AdRotator.AdvertisementFile Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示一个包含播发信息的 XML 文件的文件格式。The following code example demonstrates the file format for an XML file that contains advertisement information. 文件格式的详细信息，请参阅成员。For more information on the file format, see the member. ``` ~/Images/image1.jpg 60 190 http://www.microsoft.com Microsoft Main Site 80 Topic1 This is the caption for Ad#1 ~/Images/image2.jpg 90 90 http://www.wingtiptoys.com Wingtip Toys 80 Topic2 This is the caption for Ad#2 ```

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property UniqueID As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ UniqueID { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取 控件在层次结构中的唯一限定标识符。

span.span: Gets the unique, hierarchically qualified identifier for the control.

value.span: 服务器控件的完全限定标识符。

span.span: The fully qualified identifier for the server control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性不同于在于属性属性包含服务器控件的命名容器的标识符。This property differs from the property in that the property includes the identifier for the server control's naming container. 处理的页面请求时，将自动生成此标识符。This identifier is generated automatically when a page request is processed.
